template<class TESTEDCLASS>
void AttributeModifierListTest< TESTEDCLASS >::testStep1 (  )  [inline]

A first step of tests

It uses AttributeModifierList::addModifier to add some predefined modifier and test if it is correct. This test is used to test positive modifiers.

A second step of tests

It uses AttributeModifierList::addModifier to add some predefined modifier and test if it is correct. This test is used to test negative modifiers.

template<class TESTEDCLASS>
void AttributeModifierListTest< TESTEDCLASS >::testStep3 (  )  [inline]

A Third step of tests

It uses AttributeModifierList::addModifierInverse to add some predefined modifier and test if it is correct. This test is used to test negative modifiers.

template<class TESTEDCLASS>
void AttributeModifierListTest< TESTEDCLASS >::testUnsigned (  )  [inline]

Tests the unsigned modifiers

Unsigned modifiers are not added. They are not considered as positive modifiers.
